CustomField.description: NICC-028950 - Added for the Trust Incident Notifications project.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(End_Date__c), '', Text(MONTH(End_Date__c)) &"/"& Text(DAY(End_Date__c)) &"/"& Text(YEAR(End_Date__c)) &" "& if (ISBLANK(End_Time_GMT__c), '00:00', IF(CONTAINS(End_Time_GMT__c, ':'), End_Time_GMT__c, End_Time_GMT__c &":00")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field that combines the End Date and End Time GMT fields for display in email notifications and the Trust website.
CustomField.label: Incident End Date/Time
